regen.new_specification: The system shall deactivate user accounts with history.

regen.absent_element: notification or confirmation for account deactivation or deletion
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the user or administrator when an account is deactivated or deleted.

regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the user or administrator upon successful deactivation or deletion of an account.
